text.autoconfig.drop2inv.title: Drop2Inv
text.autoconfig.drop2inv.category.genera: If enabled, the mod is active
text.autoconfig.drop2inv.category.blocks: If enabled, block drops will go directly to the inventory
If enabled, breaking a tree log will break all the logs of that tree
If enabled, when all logs of a tree are broken, the leaves will also break (only works if Tree logs is enabled)
If enabled, breaking crops will send drops directly to the inventory
If enabled, drops from vertically growing blocks like bamboo, cactus, sugarcane, and kelp will go directly to the inventory
If enabled, breaking chorus plants will send drops directly to the inventory
text.autoconfig.drop2inv.category.mobs.m: If enabled, mob drops will go directly to the inventory
text.autoconfig.drop2inv.category.mobs.c: If enabled, drops from hostile mobs will go directly to the inventory
If enabled, drops from neutral mobs will go directly to the inventory
If enabled, drops from peaceful mobs will go directly to the inventory
text.autoconfig.drop2inv.category.mobs.s: If enabled, drops from shearing sheep will go directly into the inventory
modmenu.summaryTranslation.drop2inv: Adds the function of receive block and mob drops directly to the inventory
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.drop2inv: Adds the function of receive block and mob drops directly to the inventory
